posts.post_content:
Up for sale is ten tobacco cards, some piedmont some caporal. Nine are beaters the other one is a piedmont 150 hughie jennings portrait.
the list is
agee philadelpia sweet caporal beater
titus philadelphia sweet caporal beater
donlin ny sweet caporal beater
mcelveen brooklyn caporal beater
ganzel rochester piedmont beater
charles st louis piedmont better than the other beaters piedmont
miller pittsburgh caporal beater caporal
davis philadelphia piedmont beater
mcquilan philadelphia caporal beater
jennings piedmont 150 portrait creased down the middle pretty nice
willing to deal listening to all offers. would like a trade for post war stuff.
thanks

Andrew,
Respectfully, I don't think your price is the reason for the lack of response.
You really need to post better photos.

Tom

sorry guys on the photos. Im going to put better ones up tonight, im not sure why they came out so small.
thanks
andrew
I also recommend individual photos, or at least ones with 2 cards per photo. If you do a full group it makes it much harder to see each card. Best regards

Andrew, If you are going to take the fellas' advice you might want to add one more step and lose the plastic. The glare from your backlight will make it tough to see the cards, regardless of the size. Good luck....:)
the cards are sold guys. thanks. I will be getting a scanner shortly, the problem is that I use a laptop most of the time, with that in mind I wish there was a lightweight less bulky scanner.
